=== Statistics ===

* forum.ubuntu.ro is one of the most popular support forums in Romania with 48793 users and 172438 posts. (6369 users and 65895 posts in mid 2010 and 23576 users and 129521 posts in 2012).
* Ubuntu Touch - completely translated into Romanian
{{http://i.imgur.com/osJInpe.png}}

=== Roadmap ===

* Continue improving Ubuntu translations and documentation, together with offering support via forum.ubuntu.ro
* Take part in all major Romanian FLOSS event
* Contribute with local organizations promoting free software and technologies in education.
